targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height" or r._field == "height_std" or r._field == "start_calib")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    std_plus: r.height + r.height_std / 6.7 / r.start_calib * 100.0,
    val: r.height,
    std_minus: r.height - r.height_std / 6.7 / r.start_calib * 100.0
   }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wifi_rssi")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wifi_ssid")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp_in" or r._field == "temp_out")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Inside: r.temp_in,
    Environment: r.temp_out
    }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_level")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height_std" or r._field == "roughness")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Stddev: r.height_std,
    Growth: r.height,
    Roughness: r.roughness
    }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height" or r._field == "start_calib" or r._field == "floor_calib")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Floor: - r.floor_calib,
    Start: - r.floor_calib + r.start_calib,
    Current: - r.floor_calib + r.height / 100.0 * r.start_calib,
   }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height" or r._field == "start_calib" or r._field == "floor_calib")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Floor: - r.floor_calib,
    Start: - r.floor_calib + r.start_calib,
    Current: - r.floor_calib + r.height / 100.0 * r.start_calib,
   }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height")
  |> yield(name: "Growth")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height")
  |> movingAverage(n: 7)
  |> yield(name: "Filtered")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp_in" or r._field == "height")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Temperature: r.temp_in,
    Growth: r.height
    }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height")
  |> yield(name: "Growth")
  |> movingAverage(n: 10)
  |> derivative(unit: 1h)
  |> yield(name: "Growth rate")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wifi_rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "wifi_rssi")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    RSSI: r.wifi_rssi,
    z_Minimum: -120,
   }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "height_std" or r._field == "height" or r._field == "roughness")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    Stddev: r.height_std,
    Growth: r.height,
    Roughness: r.roughness
    }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device == "$selected_device")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_level")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
  bucket: v.defaultBucket,
  tag: "device",
  measurement: "rise",
  start: -2d,
  stop: now()
)
list.label: Device
list.name: selected_device
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
  bucket: v.defaultBucket,
  tag: "device",
  measurement: "rise",
  start: -2d,
  stop: now()
)
